get_server()

returns the request.env[HTTP_HOST] for local or for live webservers. important for mod_rewrite proxy based webs

[Source]

    # File app/controllers/application_controller.rb, line 29

33:     #for remote servers

[Source]

    # File app/controllers/application_controller.rb, line 15
15:   def render_errors_or_redirect object, redicrect_url, flash_notice
16:     if object.errors.empty?
17:       flash[:notice] = _(flash_notice)
18:       render :update do |page| page.redirect_to redicrect_url end
19:     else
20:       render :update do |page|
21:         page.replace_html 'errors', "<ul>" + object.errors.sum{|a, b| "<li>" + _(b) + "</li>"} + "</ul>"
22:         page.show "errors"
23:         page << "alchemy_window.updateHeight()"
24:       end
25:     end
26:   end
